DIA_Miltia_QM401_FOUNDSOMETHING_03_01: I report that I found something disturbing near the lower cave entrance.
DIA_Miltia_QM401_WATERFALL_03_01: This is exactly where I found this letter, but unfortunately it doesn't tell me much.
DIA_Miltia_QM401_LETTER_03_01: So what, did you manage to deduce anything from this gibberish?
DIA_Miltia_QM401_LETTER_15_01: Yes, someone wants to meet with me without witnesses. I'll take care of that while you check out the rest of the cave.
DIA_Miltia_QM401_LETTER_15_02: No, this letter doesn't make any sense. I'll take another look around here, and you guys check out the rest of the cave.
TRIA_MIL_13513_Militia_QM401_Nothing_03_: No sign of the renegades, but I found our scouts.
DIA_Miltia_QM401_LETTER_Yes_Choice: Yes, someone wants to meet me without witnesses...
DIA_Miltia_QM401_LETTER_No_Choice: No, this letter doesn't make any sense...
